publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: this is given only to the superior person!”

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: and he may be said to kept his distance from meting out punishments and honorary titles.

sense.def: application of punishments and honorary titles

tls:text.tls:line: when outside one will show brotherly respect,

sense.def: show brotherly-affection-style care for the local people

tls:text.tls:line: and he never passed judgment, positive or negative, on others.

sense.def: any individuals; human individuals; person (as having it's own features)
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
子期似王"Ziqi resembled the king": look like; be similar in appearance
resemble (in essence), be alike
adapt to the prevailing dynamics of the situation
the true highest ruler
primal energies
sometimes (... at other times)

seg.line: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運
tls:text.tls:line: Maybe Heaven will open up for a new turn as from Yáo and Shùn

sense.def: probably; in all likelihood; for all we know

tls:text.tls:line: That is surely a profound point!

sense.def: would it not V?

tls:text.tls:line: weren’t they profound!

sense.def: would it not V?

tls:text.tls:line: that must count as the most admirable.”

sense.def: be the most admirable

tls:text.tls:line: the superior person would cease to entertain these hopes (for a late revival of an imperial administrative system).

sense.def: innermost hope

tls:text.tls:line: and the petty man hopes for his (kind of) generous treatment (as evidenced in WT’s actions).

sense.def: hope

tls:text.tls:line: The Master travelled to a temple to Confucius.

sense.def: N is dedicated to Npr

seg.line: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。
tls:text.tls:line: When Yuègōng (i.e. 楊素) presented his "Classic of Eating" to the Master, and the Master would not accept it, 【The reference to the leading disciple 楊素 in this way imitates the archaic ways of personal reference in the Analects that does persist in Suí dynasty times.】

sense.def: give (something) to (someone)

tls:text.tls:line: the capital resources in it are bound to be thereby ***reduced.” 【TW finds an aspect that might advise against Confucian leniency. The second point is thoughtful and original, but one is unsure how the point fits into the context.

sense.def: get reduced

tls:text.tls:line: “If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

sense.def: if contrary to fact

tls:text.tls:line: “If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

sense.def: 其人"the right person": the right N; the right kind of N, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable

tls:text.tls:line: then in the eyes of the the common people he would surely have become 'like Heaven’!”

sense.def: the common people

tls:text.tls:line: Are you going to destroy the ‘tradition of moral decency’?”

sense.def: archaic: traditional morality

tls:text.tls:line: He treated other people’s orphans like his own.” (己 npro(.adN))

sense.def: his own contextually determinate N

seg.line: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，
tls:text.tls:line: “For a scholar who wears fine clothes and eats rare dishes, for him then to take delight in the Way,

sense.def: extravagant; elaborately or extravagantly beautiful

tls:text.tls:line: Those ***who dote on the misfortune (of others) and yearn for (other people’s) disaster 【The reduplicated Chinese notion of Schadenfreude is interesting and important here.】

sense.def: longing for the misfortune of others; Schadenfreude

tls:text.tls:line: and moreover this is the public duty of an ordinary person.

sense.def: official duty

tls:text.tls:line: “Our Master transmits ***and creates the Great Moral Truth.

sense.def: lasting, permanent

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: gentlemanly, of the gentlemanly type 女為君子儒

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: characteristic of a true gentleman; in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the true gentleman type.”

sense.def: gentlemanly, of the gentlemanly type 女為君子儒

tls:text.tls:line: were what was the eccentric kind in ancient times:

sense.def: off-putting; eccentric; mad; unconventional

tls:text.tls:line: then they will say: ‘He still is our ruler.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: then they will say: ‘He is beyond the pale.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: “This proper practice

sense.def: kind of behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: “Despising other creatures/people and setting high store by oneself

sense.def: oneself

tls:text.tls:line: Surely you speak with two tongues.”

sense.def: speak with two tongues; be dishonest; be hypocritical

tls:text.tls:line: “What Wèi Zhēng asked about are the external symptoms,

sense.def: material external appearance, material evidence

tls:text.tls:line: came to make things worse by pushing the waves to add to the flood:

sense.def: free flow

tls:text.tls:line: but their concrete practice was deceitful.

sense.def: behaviour in the past; record of actions in the past

tls:text.tls:line: but their concrete practice was deceitful.

sense.def: be deceitful

tls:text.tls:line: “When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,

sense.def: be standoffish

tls:text.tls:line: “When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,

sense.def: standoffishness

tls:text.tls:line: What about that kind of behaviour?”

sense.def: what about that? What do you think about that (the preceding, contextually determinate)?

tls:text.tls:line: “What is the point?”

sense.def: (often followed by 也：What is the point?

tls:text.tls:line: these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”

sense.def: distinguished (command etc)

tls:text.tls:line: these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”

sense.def: blessed

tls:text.tls:line: nor does he pray for pointless good fortune

sense.def: pray for

tls:text.tls:line: nor does he pray for pointless good fortune

sense.def: hope for

tls:text.tls:line: That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!
That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!

sense.def: end up in, end up with

tls:text.tls:line: That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!

sense.def: end up in, end up with

tls:text.tls:line: “Don't the Annals end-and-culminate in accordance with the Way of Heaven?!

sense.def: come to an end, finish; bring things to a close

tls:text.tls:line: That is why the superior person is well prepared for these.”

sense.def: a true gentleman; a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: These people maintained their stand to the end and were famous and beloved (of the people),

sense.def: famous position; political fame

tls:text.tls:line: “The filial ones according to our conception are different from this:
A follower asked the Master about this,

sense.def: consult (a person N2) about a determinate thing N1

tls:text.tls:line: “How true that is!

sense.def: be right, be true

tls:text.tls:line: is what ordinary people are bound to.”

sense.def: the numerous humans, the common registered and taxable people;

tls:text.tls:line: this to be responsible for what happens to one,
***put forward your good example;

sense.def: good way of doing things; proper method; good example

tls:text.tls:line: “To put up with a transgression from an honest fellow

sense.def: an insult

tls:text.tls:line: then the true king can ***organise the rites;

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: then the true king can create ritual music.” 【It is important to WT that the rules of ritual propriety as well as the celebratory court music owe their origin to propitious cosmological context: they are, as it were, not autonomous independent products human civilisation.】

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: In the teachings one can surely see the aspirations of the true king,

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:text.tls:line: If a true king emerges

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:text.tls:line: If a true king emerges

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: 1.1. Wén Zhōngzǐ ******has written: 【文中子 is the honorific posthumous name of WT. 1. This introduction is a written piece. It is a concise learned composition rather than a discourse. 2. It reads very much like an introduction to a 《續論語》envisaged by WT himself. 3.The frame of this is emphatic/emotional in both the initial and the final lines. 4. The question arises, to what extent the rest of the entries in this book are written compositions as opposed to reported dialogues.代考]

sense.def: writes; has written

tls:text.tls:line: “How very much

sense.def: 甚矣天下之惑也"how extreme the confusion of the world is!"

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: be hard to V, to be V-ed

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: 令行"orders got implemented": get acted on, get practiced; get implemented (ant. 廢 "be abandoned")

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: the Way of the (true) king; the Way of (founding father) kings

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: be hard to V, to be V-ed

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: 令行"orders got implemented" 難行 "be hard to be practised" : get acted on, get practiced; get implemented (ant. 廢 "be abandoned")

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: be earnest with respect to; make an earnest effort in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: (archaic, dialect) this (as described/specified above)

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: often emphatic:this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point; nothing other than this

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King). 【RY：斯文】

sense.def: be earnest with respect to; make an earnest effort in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: ***And so our aspiration has been the true Way. 【contrast RY: 志，記。 It appears some edition does have 誌 for 志. But I have not found that edition yet.】

sense.def: aspire to, have one's mind set on 志於

tls:text.tls:line: ***And so like this our aspiration has been the true Way. 【contrast RY: 志，記。 It appears some edition does have 誌 for 志. But I have not found that edition yet.】

sense.def: 大道 the ideal way of handling life, the Way

tls:text.tls:line: ***And so like this our aspiration has been the true Way. 【contrast RY: 志，記。 It appears some edition does have 誌 for 志. But I have not found that edition yet.】

sense.def: using this contextually determinate method> and thus, and in this way

tls:text.tls:line: ***And so like this our aspiration has been the true Way. 【contrast RY: 志，記。 It appears some edition does have 誌 for 志. But I have not found that edition yet.】

sense.def: and thus then (given this situation described in S2)

tls:text.tls:line: Where should I be picking out those Sovereign Guidelines from?
But when it came to the point of rise or fall

sense.def: juncture, point in time; period in time

tls:text.tls:line: “After the death of Confucius, ***does not the civilised culture now reside here ***with us?” 【1. This is the the immodest main message of the book, articulated here, for good reason, not by WT himself but in conversation among his senior disciples. In the Analects, it is Confucius himself who makes this politically blasphemic claim for himself. The megalomaniac WT makes the same claim for himself. This is the central message of WT. One notes that 朱熹 would not make this kind of claim.】

sense.def: this place

tls:text.tls:line: “After the death of Confucius, ***does not the civilised culture now reside here ***with us?” 【1. This is the the immodest main message of the book, articulated here, for good reason, not by WT himself but in conversation among his senior disciples. In the Analects, it is Confucius himself who makes this politically blasphemic claim for himself. The megalomaniac WT makes the same claim for himself. This is the central message of WT. One notes that 朱熹 would not make this kind of claim.】

sense.def: this [place]> here

tls:text.tls:line: When ancolytes asked the Master about ***his visit,

sense.def: retainer or follower staying with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: and the rest of the acolytes all wetted ***their lapels with tears.

sense.def: retainer or follower staying with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: “He must, before all else, have fair empathy!”

sense.def: fair empathy for others; non-discriminating considerateness; mindfulness of the concerns of others

tls:text.tls:line: even to the little boys and girls the Master was sure to show intimate concern; 【Interestingly, an advanced philologist has rewritten this plain phrase: 俞檄疑“必狎"为"不狎“之误（《诸子平议补录》卷十二）。

sense.def: little boy

tls:text.tls:line: and unifies the ultimate principles.

sense.def: archaic: unite

tls:text.tls:line: ”Dǒng Cháng becomes thoughtful when appropriate,

sense.def: as the times require; as appropriate to the (changing) occasions [cf. 以時行 "act in accordance with the (changing) times in Guanzi.]

tls:text.tls:line: ”Dǒng Cháng becomes thoughtful when appropriate,

sense.def: from time to time> sometimes; often; periodically; several times; at regular intervals; all the time

tls:text.tls:line: Someone asked about his way (philosophy of life).

sense.def: personal philosophy of life

tls:text.tls:line: “I am afraid that those who ***look at these things are a waste of one's time.” 【1. WT imagines his own behaviour being observed by others

sense.def: read the contextually determinate text

tls:text.tls:line: “I am afraid that those who ***look at these things are a waste of one's time.” 【1. WT imagines his own behaviour being observed by others

sense.def: To survey from above, synoptically and without attention to detail, taking in a scene in a sweep> to peruse a text in a cursory manner.

tls:text.tls:line: “What I have not pondered carefully I do not maintain;

sense.def: ponder precisely; assess carefully; to estimate precisely; assess objectively (not always just the extent of things)

tls:text.tls:line: “What I have not pondered carefully I do not maintain;

sense.def: hold onto as true; maintain as true; hold onto as important; negatively: not budge from

tls:text.tls:line: “What I have not pondered carefully I do not maintain;

sense.def: hold onto one's position

tls:text.tls:line: and they will say to themselves>think:

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: that is the Way of the Yí barbarians.

sense.def: general: the barbarians

tls:text.tls:line: “He was a Rú of the superior-man type.

sense.def: characteristic of a true gentleman; superior; in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: then, in all humility, I got it right;

sense.def: read pú = 僕 I, your humble servant

tls:text.tls:line: How much more should we!” 【WT recommends the way of Sage to everyone in a way that differs interestingly from that in the Analects.】

sense.def: we

tls:text.tls:line: as the historical documentation and ***the (philological) commentaries won the day, the Way of the historians was betrayed.

sense.def: the proper way/art of proper (moralising and analysing) historiography

tls:text.tls:line: as the historical documentation and ***the (philological) commentaries won the day, the Way of the historians was betrayed.

sense.def: the proper way/art of proper (moralising and analysing) historiography

tls:text.tls:line: Who would then say it is not implemented?” 【WT identifies the true Way of politics as the implementation of the principles of family virtues in the political sphere. I suppose one might say that WT spells out what is enigmatically adumbrated in the famous “道不远人”（《礼记•中庸》）.】

sense.def: how? in what way

tls:text.tls:line: Who would then say it is not implemented?” 【WT identifies the true Way of politics as the implementation of the principles of family virtues in the political sphere. I suppose one might say that WT spells out what is enigmatically adumbrated in the famous “道不远人”（《礼记•中庸》）.】

sense.def: whoever?

tls:text.tls:line: and when in disagreement not to harm ***the opponent.”

sense.def: the other(s)

tls:text.tls:line: showed respectful care with respect of what they had never seen,

sense.def: never 未之V也 as a pattern tends to mean "have never Ved it"

tls:text.tls:line: As for someone who craftily goes against his leadership

sense.def: craftily; in a devious and fraudulent manner

tls:text.tls:line: and he wrote the Fèn Pavilion Ballad on the subject. 【1. This piece ending in a report on WT's writing of poetry has a narrative fluency that is rare in ZS. 待考】

sense.def: write or compose (a document)

tls:text.tls:line: then the world/Empire was not in the hands of one emperor.

sense.def: united entity under one Emperor

tls:text.tls:line: And is not this surely true?!"

sense.def: poetic, archaic: truly

tls:text.tls:line: At that point his entourage went their way. 【1. WT bathes in his popularity among his retainers and followers and gives them a lesson: "What will people think?". 2. This piece indirectly illustrates the vast number of 門人 "retainers, entourage, hangers-on!" settled （and possibly financially supported) in or around WT's home.】

sense.def: leave the scene, go one's way

tls:text.tls:line: These things are not matters decided by Heaven,

sense.def: not be because of N

tls:text.tls:line: ***I take them to heart and will never tire of them.” 【1. Note the subtle variations in the intertextual relations in this very important piece. Note also the striking bad taste in the impersonally and pompously archaising final response which displays the kind of kitsch which to my mind usefully illustrates the spirit of stylistically false vulgar devotion apparently prevalent among the compilers of ZS.】

sense.def: get fed up 無斁 "without ever getting fed up"

tls:text.tls:line: My family, down to Tóngchuān (i.e. my father Wáng Lōng), was the sixth generation,

sense.def: time span of one generation

tls:text.tls:line: ***And yet: we have also never got to promote it so as then to put it into practice. 【RY: 不遇時。】

sense.def: this being so> and yet; however; but

tls:text.tls:line: ***And yet: we have also never got to promote it so as then to put it into practice. 【RY: 不遇時。】

sense.def: manage to; get to perform an act, get to; have had a chance to

tls:text.tls:line: ***And yet: we have also never got to promote it so as then to put it into practice. 【RY: 不遇時。】

sense.def: effectively promote; promote; propagate

tls:text.tls:line: ***And yet: we have also never got to promote it so as then to put it into practice. 【RY: 不遇時。】

sense.def: enactment, application in practice

tls:text.tls:line: We have withdrawn (from public employment) and all of us have just transmitted that Way. 【LY: 述而不作】

sense.def: live in retirement; live without being publicly employed

tls:text.tls:line: We have withdrawn (from public employment) and all of us have just transmitted that Way. 【LY: 述而不作】

sense.def: archaic: all the contextually determinate but omitted subjects

tls:text.tls:line: We have withdrawn (from public employment) and all of us have just transmitted that Way. 【LY: 述而不作】

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: We have withdrawn (from public employment) and all of us have just transmitted that Way. 【LY: 述而不作】

sense.def: 於之“in that place">there

tls:text.tls:line: The transmission from the lord of the Jiāngzhōu Mansion (Wáng Tōng’s great great great grandfather Wáng Huán 王煥)

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: were the Decisive Records on the Five Classics in five chapters,

sense.def: be

seg.line: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: in which the meaning of the discussion of the transmission from the sages and worthies was completely laid out.

sense.def: plural: words, concrete expressions; specifically: the words in literary works

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: in which the meaning of the discussion of the transmission from the sages and worthies was completely laid out.

sense.def: men of outstanding excellence; sages and worthies; sage men of worth

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: ***in the text of which the intended meaning of the systems and the transmissions from the sages and worthies is completely laid out. 【Note the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: intended meaning; intended ideas

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: ***in the text of which the intended meaning of the systems and the transmissions from the sages and worthies is completely laid out. 【Note the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: subjective intended meaning; intended purpose or overtone 本意 "basic intended subjective meaning" subjective mental orientation; what one has on one's mind

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: ***in the text of which the intended meaning of the systems and the transmissions from the sages and worthies is completely laid out. 【Note the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: be completely provided

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: ***in the text of which the intended meaning of the systems and the transmissions from the sages and worthies is completely laid out. 【Note the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: system; standards

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其言聖賢制述之意備矣。
tls:text.tls:line: ***in the text of which the intended meaning of the systems and the transmissions from the sages and worthies is completely laid out. 【Note the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: ***I, for my insignificant part, have had the opportunity to survey these completed teachings 【The use of self-deprecatory first pronouns in ZS is rhetorically important in ZS and needs to be traced carefully: when exactly, and in conversation with whom, are such pronouns used?】

sense.def: I, insignificant as I am

tls:text.tls:line: ***I, for my insignificant part, have had the opportunity to survey these completed teachings 【The use of self-deprecatory first pronouns in ZS is rhetorically important in ZS and needs to be traced carefully: when exactly, and in conversation with whom, are such pronouns used?】

sense.def: get a chance to V

tls:text.tls:line: ***I, for my insignificant part, have had the opportunity to survey these completed teachings 【The use of self-deprecatory first pronouns in ZS is rhetorically important in ZS and needs to be traced carefully: when exactly, and in conversation with whom, are such pronouns used?】

sense.def: completed, achieved; completely present; completely established, ready-made; successful

tls:text.tls:line: ***I, for my insignificant part, have had the opportunity to survey these completed teachings 【The use of self-deprecatory first pronouns in ZS is rhetorically important in ZS and needs to be traced carefully: when exactly, and in conversation with whom, are such pronouns used?】

sense.def: instructive teachings

tls:text.tls:line: one cannot spell it out for posterity. 【Adjustment concrete 法 according to circumstances 權 is always necessary according to WT.】

sense.def: be reached

tls:text.tls:line: Such is the Way of Heaven.” 【This analysis of the psychology of the control of one's philosophical reactions to the world is significant its notion of 余 "residual" in psychology and seems to be based on psychological self-observation.】

sense.def: way of heaven>law of nature

tls:text.tls:line: they despised bravery and physical strength.” 【I read this is a delicate analytic piece on the PHILOSOPHY of archery as the metaphorical art of cultivating the Kantian purely moral and disinterested focus.】

sense.def: often graded: regard as vulgar; hold in low(er) esteem; think nothing of; despise, hold in contempt

tls:text.tls:line: should rather be slow (and sustained);

sense.def: instead of VERB-ing(Nab) one should rather prefer to V

tls:text.tls:line: ***“It is never to be self-serving.”

sense.def: never!; one should never!

tls:text.tls:line: ***“It is never to be self-serving.”

sense.def: be selfish; be directed towards selfish ends; pursue selfish aims

tls:text.tls:line: “It is never to be partial.”

sense.def: never!; one should never!

tls:text.tls:line: “May I ask about the ***right method of transforming others?

sense.def: reform; fundamentally reeducate

tls:text.tls:line: “May I ask about the ***right method of transforming others?

sense.def: fundamental reform; fundamental education of the people; Greek: paideia

tls:text.tls:line: “May I ask about the ***right method of transforming others?

sense.def: have the temerity to; presume; venture to, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: “May I ask about the ***right method of transforming others?

sense.def: 大道 the ideal way of handling life, the Way

tls:text.tls:line: “May I ask about the ***right method of transforming others?

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N about the matter Nab

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: our master; person in authority [Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: our master; person in authority [Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

tls:text.tls:line: Fáng Xuánlíng (579 - 648, 進士 age 17, famous politician and historian, senior editor of one of the 24 Histories:《晉書》; general under 李世民， ) asked about the Way of serving a ruler. 【

sense.def: seek counsel on; ask about Xing 問為仁

tls:text.tls:line: Fáng Xuánlíng (579 - 648, 進士 age 17, famous politician and historian, senior editor of one of the 24 Histories:《晉書》; general under 李世民， ) asked about the Way of serving a ruler. 【

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N about the matter Nab

tls:text.tls:line: He asked about the Way of deploying others.

sense.def: seek counsel on; ask about Xing 問為仁

tls:text.tls:line: He asked about the Way of deploying others.

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N about the matter Nab

tls:text.tls:line: He asked about ritual propriety and ritual music.

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N about the matter Nab

tls:text.tls:line: Somebody asked about Yáng Sù 楊素 (died 606, distinguished poet and general).

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N2 about N1

tls:text.tls:line: 3.2 An outsider asked about Yáng Sù 楊素 (died 606, distinguished poet and general).

sense.def: singular: an outsider

tls:text.tls:line: Fáng Xuánlíng (579 - 648, very famous politician and historian) asked about the political system of provinces and districts.

sense.def: consult the contextually determinate N about the matter Nab

tls:text.tls:line: Fáng Xuánlíng (579 - 648, very famous politician and historian) asked about the political system of provinces and districts.

sense.def: proper governance, good government; proper government; matters of proper government

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: respond to what has been asked as follows; reply to the questioner, saying

seg.line: 王道盛則禮樂從而興焉，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王道盛則禮樂從而興焉，
tls:text.tls:line: “When the Way of the ***Founding Father Kings thrives then ritual propriety and music will get to thrive.

sense.def: the Way of the (true) king; the Way of (founding father) kings

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王道盛則禮樂從而興焉，
tls:text.tls:line: “When the Way of the ***Founding Father Kings thrives then ritual propriety and music will get to thrive:

sense.def: be in a flourishing state, be in full vigour; flourish

tls:text.tls:srcline: 王道盛則禮樂從而興焉，
tls:text.tls:line: “When the Way of the ***Founding Father Kings thrives then ritual propriety and music will get to thrive:

sense.def: ritual and ritual music, public ritual performances

tls:text.tls:line: “The various (feudal) states under the ancestral Zhōu lasted for eight hundred years.

sense.def: ancestral

tls:text.tls:line: The Imperial Hàn made its mixed arrangements for more than four hundred years.

sense.def: august

tls:text.tls:line: The Imperial Hàn made its mixed arrangements for more than four hundred years.

sense.def: in a mixed way

tls:text.tls:line: From the Wèi and the Jìn downwards

sense.def: from N onwards

tls:text.tls:line: The Master replied:

sense.def: respond to what has been asked as follows; reply to the questioner, saying

tls:text.tls:line: But this is not something within your ***intellectual reach境界.” 【1. WT fancies himself, literarily, as being in conversation with one of the greats of his time in an aggressive fictional dialogue. (see already in ZS 2.3) 2. The consistent presentation of one of the most famous men of his time as WT's disciple is a certainly without any basis in history, as ZP 2013A p. 25, note 3 points out:《中说》中房玄龄为王通弟子（参见2.3、3.1、3.3、3.11、3.23、4.5、4.42、8.22、8.25、9.11、9.25、10.4 等章），不可信。 章太炎：““绩称玄龄为梁公，则玄龄非文中弟子可知.”（《国学讲演录》. Yin Xieli and Liu Hailan p. 84 concur: 显然，王绩认为魏征是王通的弟子，而房玄龄和李靖并不是王通的弟子，但应该与王通有过交往，所以才提到他们。这里称魏征为“吾家魏学士”已属夸大，... (Note that Wáng Jì has a vested interest in exaggerating the number of students of his elder brother.) 3. Persistently, throughout ZS, WT poses as the oracular master of this famous man. 3. Even supposing that WT got to talk to the great man, the exchange would never have taken this shape of repeated oracular consultation. 4. The compilers of ZS must have known that one of the most famous men of their time was not, in fact, a disciple of WT's. 5. I conclude that the book is compiled as a work by a fantaisiste, and it may even have been intended to be read as a book not ONLY of historical records of what was said but ALSO of what what WT wished had been said and even of what WT wished he had said himself. 6. Perhaps the whole book contained what its editors wished had been said. 5. 】

sense.def: reach up to intellectually, understand (a difficult subject); be well-informed on

tls:text.tls:line: But this is not something within your ***intellectual reach境界.” 【1. WT fancies himself, literarily, as being in conversation with one of the greats of his time in an aggressive fictional dialogue. (see already in ZS 2.3) 2. The consistent presentation of one of the most famous men of his time as WT's disciple is a certainly without any basis in history, as ZP 2013A p. 25, note 3 points out:《中说》中房玄龄为王通弟子（参见2.3、3.1、3.3、3.11、3.23、4.5、4.42、8.22、8.25、9.11、9.25、10.4 等章），不可信。 章太炎：““绩称玄龄为梁公，则玄龄非文中弟子可知.”（《国学讲演录》. Yin Xieli and Liu Hailan p. 84 concur: 显然，王绩认为魏征是王通的弟子，而房玄龄和李靖并不是王通的弟子，但应该与王通有过交往，所以才提到他们。这里称魏征为“吾家魏学士”已属夸大，... (Note that Wáng Jì has a vested interest in exaggerating the number of students of his elder brother.) 3. Persistently, throughout ZS, WT poses as the oracular master of this famous man. 3. Even supposing that WT got to talk to the great man, the exchange would never have taken this shape of repeated oracular consultation. 4. The compilers of ZS must have known that one of the most famous men of their time was not, in fact, a disciple of WT's. 5. I conclude that the book is compiled as a work by a fantaisiste, and it may even have been intended to be read as a book not ONLY of historical records of what was said but ALSO of what what WT wished had been said and even of what WT wished he had said himself. 6. Perhaps the whole book contained what its editors wished had been said. 5. 】

sense.def: familiar: you

tls:text.tls:line: “He has created good fortune for himself, he has created a position of authority, and he lives extremely well (eating from jade dishes?):

sense.def: set up, originate (something), create, invent; produce; of texts: compose

tls:text.tls:line: “He has created good fortune for himself, he has created a position of authority, and he lives extremely well (eating from jade dishes?):

sense.def: awe-inspiring authority; dominant power

tls:text.tls:line: as for the rest of him I have no idea.” 【1. WT finds that the man is all external show and appearances, thus cultivating his own image of a person of profound thoughtful substance. 2. The description of another serves as a foil to indirectly stress his own superiority.】

sense.def: the rest, everything else; anything else about the matter

tls:text.tls:line: their demise came in no time.

sense.def: ZUO: be imminent

tls:text.tls:line: their demise came in no time.

sense.def: ruin, annihilation

tls:text.tls:line: Yáng Sù 楊素 (died 606, poet and general, general and poet!) sent someone to tell the Master:

sense.def: order someone to V

tls:text.tls:line: Yáng Sù 楊素 (died 606, poet and general, general and poet!) sent someone to tell the Master:

sense.def: address N and say S

tls:text.tls:line: Yáng Sù 楊素 (died 606, poet and general, general and poet!) sent someone to tell the Master:

sense.def: our master; person in authority 咱們德先生[Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

tls:text.tls:line: The Master said:

sense.def: our master; person in authority 咱們德先生[Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

tls:text.tls:line: at the bend of the River Fèn,

sense.def: bend (in a river)

tls:text.tls:line: the humble cottage of my forefathers is still there.

sense.def: the contextually determinate N's ancestor

tls:text.tls:line: the humble cottage of my forefathers is still there.

sense.def: tattered

tls:text.tls:line: the humble cottage of my forefathers is still there.

sense.def: hut; simple hut (often built next to a tomb to house the mourner during the mourning period)

tls:text.tls:line: the humble cottage of my forefathers is still there.

sense.def: be in (that contextually determinate) place

tls:text.tls:line: As long as the seasons are good and the harvests are rich

sense.def: harvest

tls:text.tls:line: As long as the seasons are good and the harvests are rich

sense.def: be abundant; be strong and resourceful

tls:text.tls:line: “Extreme indeed was the cruelty of Wén Xuān, ruler of the Northern Qí 北齊文宣王(Gāo Yáng 高洋, lived 529 - 559, died a violent death after ten years’ rule)!

sense.def: ruthlessness; cruel oppression; cruelty

tls:text.tls:line: “Why are you deemed to be over the top/overexcited?

sense.def: be overly worried; be overexcited; be overwrought

tls:text.tls:line: Aren't you really frantic?” 【Here as in the Analects the 江湖 intellectual is endowed with the subtle psychological sensibility that is so rare in the rest of the personalities.】

sense.def: be overwrought; get urgently concerned; get overly concerned

tls:text.tls:line: (on the contrary:) what hurts me is the apathy of our times.” 【1. WT is presented here at his witty best. 2. The focus on the Zeitgeist is original and concise. 3. I read this as a conversational gem. And I would like to know if others feel otherwise.】

sense.def: apathy; inertia; indolence; lethargy

tls:text.tls:line: (on the contrary:) what hurts me is the apathy of our times.” 【1. WT is presented here at his witty best. 2. The focus on the Zeitgeist is original and concise. 3. I read this as a conversational gem. And I would like to know if others feel otherwise.】

sense.def: the times; the present time ; present political milieu

tls:text.tls:line: “It isn't as if I would presume to be overexcited,

sense.def: be overwrought; get urgently concerned; get overly concerned

tls:text.tls:line: and ***that is how they got the world to prosper.” 【1. Here as so often elsewhere WT realistically focusses on the crucial role of senior ministers in history. 2. This is here, as always, pro domo: he emphasises the immense role of those who play the role that he is dreaming of playing himself.】

sense.def: cause to be healthy and serene; give peace to; give a serene appearance to

tls:text.tls:line: and have worked carefully on them for nine years. 【This is an important detail dating the composition of this piece.】

sense.def: put in a strenuous effort on the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: and have worked carefully on them for nine years. 【This is an important detail dating the composition of this piece.】

sense.def: year, (number of years) something has lasted

tls:text.tls:line: I have ingested the main ideas of my forebears

sense.def: devote oneself to the study of

tls:text.tls:line: I have ingested the main ideas of my forebears

sense.def: our forefathers; the forefathers

tls:text.tls:line: and I have investigated the mindset of Confucius 【The mindset and not the text was his focus.】

sense.def: archaic: investigate (e.g. antiquity)

tls:text.tls:line: and I have investigated the mindset of Confucius 【The mindset and not the text was his focus.】

sense.def: innermost attitudes, personal ideas, innermost thoughts

tls:text.tls:line: The transmission from Sir Mù of Jìnyáng (Wáng Tōng’s great great grandfather Wáng Qiú 王虯, 428-500)

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: was the ***Major Discussion on Administration in eight chapters,

sense.def: be

tls:text.tls:line: The transmission from the lord of the Tóngzhōu Mansion (Wáng Tōng’s great grandfather Wáng Yán 王彥)

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: was the eight chapters of the Minor Discussion of Administration in eight chapters,

sense.def: be

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a complete discussion of the achievements of a king and of a hegemon. 【Note again the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: kings or hegemons

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a complete discussion of the achievements of a king and of a hegemon. 【Note again the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: professional achievements of N

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a complete discussion of the achievements of a king and of a hegemon. 【Note again the 誇飾法.】

sense.def: be exhaustively explained

tls:text.tls:line: The transmission from Sir Xiàn of Ānkāng (Wáng Tōng’s grandfather, died 581)

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: were the Political Disquisitions on the Ultimate Principles in nine chapters,

sense.def: be

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a profound account of the negative and positive impulses of the Three Factors (Heaven, Earth, Man).

sense.def: basic constituents of the universe (as in 三才 "Heaven, Earth and Man)

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a profound account of the negative and positive impulses of the Three Factors (Heaven, Earth, Man).

sense.def: rejection (of an alternative)

tls:text.tls:line: in the text of which there is a profound account of the negative and positive impulses of the Three Factors (Heaven, Earth, Man).

sense.def: urge for, tendency towards,

tls:text.tls:line: The transmission from the lord of the Mansion of Tóngchuān (Wáng Lōng 王隆 (no dates, Wáng Tōng’s father, much respected scholar, often referred to as the lord of the Tóngchuān Mansion.)

sense.def: transmission(s), things transmitted

tls:text.tls:line: in which there was a clear account of the successes and failures during the Six Dynasties.

sense.def: dynasty 三代，五代，七代; HANSHU 漢代內史

tls:text.tls:line: in which there was a clear account of the successes and failures during the Six Dynasties.

sense.def: relative achievement; ratio of success versus failure

tls:text.tls:line: so that (all) the affairs of Heaven (the cosmos) and of Man,

sense.def: fact; real state of affairs; Buddhist: concrete phenomenal world as opposed to the world of underlying principles

tls:text.tls:line: so that (all) the affairs of Heaven (the cosmos) and of Man,

sense.def: matters relating to N

tls:text.tls:line: the true Way of the emperors and kings (of old),

sense.def: 大道 the ideal way of handling life, the Way

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2.A. The Master said to (his favourite young disciple) Dǒng Cháng: 【It is not by coincidence that it is only after having identified WT by his posthumous appellation first, the second reference to him is already by honorific onomastic avoidance (敬避名 as opposed to mere 迴避人名 , name avoidance). Such onomastic avoidance was common, but not universal in the Analects. The careful analysis of the functions of honorific onomastic avoidance is crucial for an understanding of the Analects and now also for and understanding of the ZS. There is nothing 當然爾 about this】

sense.def: address N and say S

tls:text.tls:line: “***Setting about working on the Primal Classic,

sense.def: cultivate through study

tls:text.tls:line: “***Setting about working on the Primal Classic,

sense.def: marker of the future: be about to, will; tend to

tls:text.tls:line: I investigated ***all the various histories and disquisitions,

sense.def: archaic: investigate (e.g. antiquity)

tls:text.tls:line: I investigated ***all the various histories and disquisitions,

sense.def: all the various Ns, (after negations etc.) any of various Ns

tls:text.tls:line: I investigated ***all the various histories and disquisitions,

sense.def: historical record

tls:text.tls:line: I investigated ***all the various histories and disquisitions,

sense.def: discussions; theories; views

tls:text.tls:line: but they did not provide sufficient evidence (for my points), 【Cf. LY3.9】

sense.def: provide good evidence for the contextually determinate object; confirm

tls:text.tls:line: Setting about writing a sequel of the Odes

sense.def: continue the tradition of and write a sequel to

tls:text.tls:line: I checked the collected writings and the historical records,

sense.def: examine carefully; to submit to a close examination; to investigate strictly Shiji: 考信

tls:text.tls:line: I checked the collected writings and the historical records,

sense.def: books of all kinds, all sorts of books

tls:text.tls:line: and these did not provide sufficient evidence for my points, LY3.9

sense.def: provide good evidence for the contextually determinate object; confirm

tls:text.tls:line: Setting about writing the Sequel to the Documents 【Watch the word-play on the book title!】

sense.def: continue the tradition of and write a sequel to

tls:text.tls:line: I referred back to the various memoirs

sense.def: written records of all sorts

tls:text.tls:line: and these did not provide sufficient evidence for my points, LY3.9

sense.def: provide good evidence for the contextually determinate object; confirm

tls:text.tls:line: “What you got, our Master,

sense.def: you, Sir

tls:text.tls:line: “What you achieved, our Master,

sense.def: objective achieved

sense.def: our master; person in authority 咱們德先生[Note that the [post-N] can never in fact be made explicit without breaking the rules of the grammar! CH]

sense.def: say; often summarising, non-literal: use words to the effect, Alekseev: он сказал ему так:"

tls:text.tls:line: ***was presumably what you were aiming for ***in these works.”

sense.def: one's high resolve; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: 1.3 The Master said to Xuē Shōu 薛收 (591 - 624, another one of Wáng Tōng’s main disciples, described as 仁 “morally perfect" in 6.17):

sense.def: address N and say S

tls:text.tls:line: “In ancient times 【當年 is much better than the English!】 the Sage (i.e. Confucius) transmitted three works of history:

sense.def: Confucius, the sage

tls:text.tls:line: “In ancient times 【當年 is much better than the English!】 the Sage (i.e. Confucius) transmitted three works of history:

sense.def: historical record

tls:text.tls:line: when he transmitted the Documents

sense.def: transmit (a tradition, a book), aiming for deep understanding

tls:text.tls:line: the régime of the Three Sovereigns and Five Kings was fully presented;

sense.def: established system; basic rules; principled systematic practice; French: régime

tls:text.tls:line: ***therefore, when one sought these matters one would find ***them all;

sense.def: seek after N1 in the place N2

tls:text.tls:line: When he transmitted the Songs

sense.def: transmit (a tradition, a book), aiming for deep understanding

tls:text.tls:line: he clearly brought out the origins for the rise and fall of things became ; 【由 "that from which something comes" is perhaps distinct from (though close to) 因 "causes".】

sense.def: rise and decline

tls:text.tls:line: he clearly brought out the origins for the rise and fall of things became ; 【由 "that from which something comes" is perhaps distinct from (though close to) 因 "causes".】

sense.def: cause > base, origin; reason

tls:text.tls:line: he clearly brought out the origins for the rise and fall of things became ; 【由 "that from which something comes" is perhaps distinct from (though close to) 因 "causes".】

sense.def: emerge clearly; be visible to all; be public and clear (as the laws)

tls:text.tls:line: therefore, when one studied these things one would find them all (the origins).

sense.def: to make a careful complete investigation, have a complete understanding

tls:text.tls:line: therefore, when one studied these things one would find them all (the origins).

sense.def: all the relevant objects; all the just-mentioned relevant objects

tls:text.tls:line: When he transmitted the Annals

sense.def: transmit (a tradition, a book), aiming for deep understanding

tls:text.tls:line: but they ***must not be mixed up with one another.

sense.def: be mixed (and thus produced)

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Sage (Confucius) kept them apart.” 【The crucial specific point for WT is the subsumption of the Odes under the category of records preserved by the 史. The Odes are treated as an important historical source throughout, none of the literary/aesthetic perspective on the Odes on display in the Analects is found in ZS. This piece sets out the textual foundation for WT's view of history.

sense.def: Confucius, the sage

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore the Sage (Confucius) kept them apart.” 【The crucial specific point for WT is the subsumption of the Odes under the category of records preserved by the 史. The Odes are treated as an important historical source throughout, none of the literary/aesthetic perspective on the Odes on display in the Analects is found in ZS. This piece sets out the textual foundation for WT's view of history.

sense.def: hold apart, distinguish

tls:text.tls:line: “As I look at the tradition after Sīmǎ Qiān and Bān Gù,

sense.def: =以下 (in time) after N

tls:text.tls:line: aren't the transmitted works (on history) multifarious indeed?! 【Exclamatory 乎 (idiomatically linked to a 其 earlier in the sentence, is characteristic of WT's style. He is given to an emotional reaction to things in an exclamatory rhetorically emphatic style.】

sense.def: How V!

tls:text.tls:line: aren't the transmitted works (on history) multifarious indeed?! 【Exclamatory 乎 (idiomatically linked to a 其 earlier in the sentence, is characteristic of WT's style. He is given to an emotional reaction to things in an exclamatory rhetorically emphatic style.】

sense.def: How V!

tls:text.tls:line: The designs/intentions of Heaven and of Man, (BHT 21.143.2)

sense.def: wish, intention, purpose QIMINYAOSHU 蔡倫立意造紙

tls:text.tls:line: The designs/intentions of Heaven and of Man, (BHT 21.143.2)

sense.def: N's intentions; N's desires

tls:text.tls:line: When the Master was seriously unwell (on his deathbed) and heard about the upheaval at Jiāngdū (the assassination of 隋煬帝）【This deathbed scene comes up in several variants. One is sure that none of them are historical. See 8.23.】

sense.def: 天子有病的諱稱； be unwell，be seriously ill

tls:text.tls:line: he was in tears and, all excited, he said:

sense.def: be all in tears

tls:text.tls:line: the signs of what is deviant and what is correct were made clear

sense.def: correctness or otherwise; orthodoxy or otherwise

seg.line: 帝王之道，其暗而不明乎？

tls:text.tls:srcline: 帝王之道，其暗而不明乎？
tls:text.tls:line: The Way of the Sovereigns and Kings ***did it not remain obscure and unclear (***with the later historians)?! 【The emphatic rhetorical mode continues.】

sense.def: obscure

tls:text.tls:srcline: 帝王之道，其暗而不明乎？
tls:text.tls:line: The Way of the Sovereigns and Kings ***did it not remain obscure and unclear (***with the later historians)?! 【The emphatic rhetorical mode continues.】

sense.def: obscure
